block.p: June Azoulay, a psychotherapist, and George Kalinsky, a photographer, will be married this afternoon by Rabbi Martin Rozenberg at the Community Synagogue in Sands Point, N.Y.

Ms. Azoulay, who will keep her name, has a private practice in Sands Point and is a director of Child Abuse Prevention Services, a volunteer group in Roslyn, N.Y. She graduated from Queens College and received a master's degree in psychological counseling from the C. W. Post Campus of Long Island University and another in social work from Yeshiva University. She is a daughter of Alice Edelman of Forest Hills, Queens, and the late Ben Edelman.
June Azoulay, a psychotherapist, and George Kalinsky, a photographer, will be married this afternoon by Rabbi Martin Rozenberg at the Community Synagogue in Sands Point, N.Y.

Ms. Azoulay, who will keep her name, has a private practice in Sands Point and is a director of Child Abuse Prevention Services, a volunteer group in Roslyn, N.Y. She graduated from Queens College and received a master's degree in psychological counseling from the C. W. Post Campus of Long Island University and another in social work from Yeshiva University. She is a daughter of Alice Edelman of Forest Hills, Queens, and the late Ben Edelman.

Mr. Kalinsky is the official photographer for Madison Square Garden and is the owner of Major League Graphics, a design and photography company in Port Washington, N.Y. He graduated from Pratt Institute, from which he also received a master's degree in industrial design. He is a son of Fay Kalinsky of Hempstead, N.Y., and the late Samuel Kalinsky.
The bride's previous marriage ended in divorce; the bridegroom was a widower.
